title: Yuba powers up Kombi E5 Compact Cargo bike for entry level hauling by bike
content:
Just over a year ago, Yuba launched the Kombi – a compact, entry level cargo bike. Not surprisingly, since that launch Yuba has gotten a ton of requests for an e-bike version of the Kombi. As a result, the Kombi E5 just powered up and is ready to haul your cargo with ease. Calling it […]

The post Yuba powers up Kombi E5 Compact Cargo bike for entry level hauling by bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
